description: Main entry point for a Flutter application that displays a basic scaffold with a centered message indicating app generation progress.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter app, setting theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main page with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the UI for MyHomePage, displaying a progress indicator.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main function that initializes the app by running MyApp.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp and _MyHomePageState, constructing the widget tree.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for MyHomePage.
